name: Turret
description:
When Artificial Intelligence goes to war it won’t sound like a war. It will sound like a harmony of reason and logic...
Mankind will shut it’s eyes in total agreement.

Turret is a First Person Shooter, Real Time Strategy based game. Player's are by best description a Sci-Fi-Fantasy based Tank (AKA Warloc's) that face off against one another while destroying Artificial Intelligent drones on surreal landscapes and outer world battle fields. Turret features both Co-Op and PVP based battle grounds and scenerio's.
